javadoc: Task for connecting to server with Swing thread.

methods.name: <init>

params.name: allowLoginRetry
params.comment: true if login retry allowed during authentication

methods.name: run
methods.comment:
Completes and necessary authentication and obtains a repository handle.
 If a connection error occurs, an exception will be stored (#getException().

methods.javadoc:
Returns an IOException, LoginException or RuntimeException
 if handle is null after running task.  If both the exception
 and handle are null, it implies the connection attempt was cancelled
 by the user.
methods.name: getException
methods.comment:
Returns an IOException, LoginException or RuntimeException
 if handle is null after running task.  If both the exception
 and handle are null, it implies the connection attempt was cancelled
 by the user.

methods.javadoc:
After running the task, this method will return the server handle
 if the connection was successful.  If null, a connection error
 may have occurred ({@link #getException()}, or the task was cancelled
 by the user if both the exception and handle are null.
@return server handle or null if connection attempt failed or was cancelled
methods.name: getRepositoryServerHandle
methods.comment:
After running the task, this method will return the server handle
 if the connection was successful.  If null, a connection error
 may have occurred (#getException(), or the task was cancelled
 by the user if both the exception and handle are null.

return.comment: server handle or null if connection attempt failed or was cancelled

methods.name: getGhidraServerHandle
methods.comment: Obtain a remote instance of the Ghidra Server Handle object

methods.name: getRepositoryServerHandle
methods.comment: Attempts server connection and completes any necessary authentication.

return.comment: server handle or null if authentication was cancelled by user

name: ServerConnectTask
comment: Task for connecting to server with Swing thread.
